member.name: IP_ADAPTER_INDEX_MAP
member.summary: TheIP_ADAPTER_INDEX_MAP structure stores the interface index associated with a network adapter with IPv4 enabled together with the name of the network adapter.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_INDEX_MAP.Index
member.summary: The interface index associated with the network adapter.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_INDEX_MAP.Name
member.summary: A pointer to a Unicode string that contains the name of the adapter.
